summary: This is a court subpoena issued by the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, commanding an unnamed recipient to appear on November 29, 2021, to testify and produce a birth certificate in the case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell. The subpoena is signed by U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case United States v. Ghislaine Maxwell, for which testimony and evidence are being compelled.

persons.name: Audrey Strauss
persons.context: Signed the subpoena as the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York, issuing the command to the recipient.

events.title: Scheduled Court Appearance for Testimony
events.description: The subpoena commands an unnamed recipient to appear in court to testify and provide evidence, specifically a birth certificate, in the case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

locations: 40 Foley Square, Courtroom 906, Borough of Manhattan, City of New York, New York
One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: A subpoena was issued on July 28, 2021, compelling an unnamed individual to appear in court on November 29, 2021, for the Ghislaine Maxwell criminal case.
The subpoena demands the production of a birth certificate for an unspecified individual as part of the evidence.
The document is signed by U.S. Attorney Audrey Strauss, indicating active prosecution by the Southern District of New York.
Failure to comply with the subpoena is stated to constitute contempt of court, subjecting the recipient to civil sanctions and criminal penalties.
